We want to express our sincere gratitude to our customers from the bottom of our hearts for the support and trust we have received from them on this journey. We will continue to work toward our goal of providing excellent customer service to our customers in the upcoming days.

Blackquote:
From our heart to your family, we have achieved remarkable achievement by reaching 1 million active customers. Not just a number of 1 million: it is a great achievement for us and respected customers, staff working at different locations and our helpful well wishers are the factor of this achievement. We are continuously working together to make the future of digital Nepal a golden one with the vision of "connecting everyone wherever." We are grateful to our customers for being a companion on our journey.
From our hearts to your homes, we've achieved this remarkable milestone of 8 lakh active customers. It's not just a number; it's an achievement for us, and this is only because of our loyal customers, the dedicated internal staff of different locations, and our supportive well-wishers. Together, we're working towards our vision of "Connecting Everyone, Anywhere, All the Time" and creating a brighter digital future for Nepal. We are very thankful to our customers for being part of our journey!
#WorldLinkJourney #WorldLinkMilestone #ChitoBhanekaiWorldLink #WorldLink #WorldlinkFamily #Connecting800000households #WLINK #internet
  · See original
  · Rate this translation
